description: This file implements the core functions of the Ansc Simple Client UDP Object, including buffer retrieval, receiving, and sending packets over UDP sockets, with support for different socket modes and error handling.

methods.name: PVOID AnscScuoGetRecvBuffer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PULONG pulSize)
methods.description: Retrieves a buffer to hold incoming UDP packet data if the object is active and a buffer exists.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscScuoRecv(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Processes an incoming packet, delegating further handling to a registered worker, and clears the buffer if necessary.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscScuoSend(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Sends data over UDP to the peer address specified in the object, supporting socket modes and handling errors.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscScuoSend2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulPeerAddr,USHORT usPeerPort,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Sends data to a specified peer address and port, supporting socket modes and handling errors.

ctags.name: AnscScuoSend2
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulPeerAddr,USHORT usPeerPort,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
